item.title: The 2020 - 2021 NBA shooting season is more surprising than you think
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.6 ✓ dplyr 1.0.8 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.3 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 2.0.1 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(scales) ## ## Attaching package: 'scales' ## The following object is masked from 'package:purrr': ## ## discard ## The following object is masked from 'package:readr': ## ## col_factor library(waffle) library(ggrepel) library(gt) library(ggalt) ## Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggalt': ## method from ## grid.

item.title: About Connor Wieseman
item.description: My name is Connor Wieseman, I am a junior at the University of Nebraska - Lincoln. I am double majoring in Journalism and Sports Media and Communication, with a minor in Communication Studies. I am originally from Aurora, Illinois, but moved to Omaha, Nebraska, summer of 2017. After graduation I have two future plans. The first one, being a sports recruiter for either a college or professional sports team. I have experience with meeting and talking to people I never met, as I was a part my fraternity rush team from March 2020 to November 2021.
